meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The toy had an animallike appearance with its furry texture.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper noticed the animallike behavior of the chimpanzee.
meanings.sent3: The animallike drawing of the elephant made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were animallike, graceful and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The forest at night took on an eerie, animallike quality.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The robotic dog had animallike features that amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The cat's animallike instincts helped it catch the mouse.
meanings.sent3: The animallike sounds coming from the bushes startled the hikers.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had an animallike intensity, full of determination.
meanings.sent5: The storm outside had an animallike ferocity, shaking the windows.
